llm_output.summary: A result-oriented professional with over 10 years of experience in application development, service delivery, and client relationship management in the Contact Center and Enterprise voice & media domain. Proficient in Genesys Cloud APIs, Genesys Cloud Architect, Genesys Cloud WFM & QM, and other related technologies. Certified Genesys Cloud CX Specialist with a proven track record of leading teams and delivering successful projects.
